trashslot.serverNotInstalled: 服务器没有安装垃圾桶。此 Mod 将被禁用。
text.autoconfig.trashslot.title: 垃圾桶
config.trashslot.title: TrashSlot
config.trashslot.instantDeletion.tooltip: This causes the deletion slot to delete items instantly, similar to Creative Mode.
config.trashslot.enableDeleteKeysInCreat: Set to true if you want the delete keybindings to work in creative as well. Note: Items will be deleted permanently in creative, regardless of instantDeletion setting!
config.trashslot.enableHints.tooltip: TrashSlot will show a hint the first time the trash slot is toggled off or can be enabled on a supported screen. Set to false to disable.
config.trashslot.allowDeletionWhileTrash: Allow Deletion While TrashSlot is Invisible
Not recommended, but this will allow you to use the keybinds for deleting items even if the trash slot itself is hidden.
config.trashslot.deletionDenyList.toolti: List of items that cannot be deleted, in comma-separated format of "modid:name".
trashslot.hint.toggleOn: 按下%s键以启用屏幕上的垃圾槽！
trashslot.hint.toggledOff: 你已经关闭了垃圾槽！按%s重新启用它。
